newsitem.title: USA: N.Y. Fed Press Briefing - May 8.
newsitem.headline: N.Y. Fed Press Briefing - May 8.

text.p: The Federal Reserve said it had one large one day net misses in its reserve projections in the latest week, a Fed spokeswoman said.
The miss, which occurred on Thursday, resulted in more reserves than anticipated because Treasury deposited were much lower than anticipated.
The high in natural float was a bit under $750 million on Tuesday, while the low in natural float was a about $325 million on Monday.
Transporation float averaged about $20 million per day with the high on Friday at about $35 million primarily due to weather delays in New York.
